entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
